ygData.subject: Re: Best looking clerics?....
ygData.msgSnippet: I guess the one thing I d think about here is not the looks but good vs evil. I just restarted my DE cleric - and I personally think they look good in anything
ygData.messageBody:
I guess the one thing I'd think about here is not the looks but good
vs evil. I just restarted my DE cleric - and I personally think they
look good in anything but brass <shudder>. DE's are limited in the
areas that they can go though (or so it seems to me). Seems like the
vast majority of areas I'm KOS. I have to be invised by friends to
travel the majority of the realms. When you first create the char you
are warned that it's a high difficultly combination. If you want to
travel freely you spend a lot of time killing things to raise your
faction. I sometimes wish I could move about as freely as a goodie -
but oh well - I love my DE.

Pyuna
~7th Level DE Cleric

>From: "Rose" <rliu@...>
>
>Hello,
>
>This might be a silly plead for advice but here it is...I am restarting my
>cleric on a new server. My old cleric is a high elf female. I am torn
>between restarting as a dark elf or stick with the high elf. Which in
>y'all's opinion...looks better? I have never seen a dark elf in the purple
>armor...do they look silly? Does the purple make em look like a blueberry
>and grape mix? I have never seen a dark elf in the yellow quest armor as
>well. I do like the way the dark elf females look but given the color
>scheme I might not be able to live with myself if the color is too much of
>an offense to my fashion sense =). The only thing I do not like about the
>high elf females is the face...they look too haughty. Although I have to
>admit that plate armor looks really good on the females. However, another
>reluctance is the fact that there just seems to be more high elves cleric
>then dark elves...yeah I know the stat is better...but I want to look my
>best as well and be unique ;) Anyway advise is appreciated...thanks.
>
>These are female characters I am talking about.
>
>-Imogen
>
>
